Label: A rdfs:label
Assay type: C realizes some ('analyte role' and (role_of some %))

Label: 2b-RAD
Description: Genotyping technique for population structure inferences

Label: 2P-Seq
Description: Poly(A)-primed sequencing (2P-seq) to quantify usage of known poly(A) sites

Label: 3-Seq
Description: 3’-end sequencing for expression quantification (3SEQ) from FFPE samples

Label: 4sUDRB-seq
Description: Gene-specific differences in elongation rates in vivo (4sUDRB-seq)

Label: 5’-GRO-seq
Description: Detect nascent RNA with a 5’ 7-methylguanylated cap (5’-GRO-seq)

Label: 5PSeq
Description: Profiles the genome-wide abundance of mRNA degradation intermediates by their 5′-phosphorylated ends (5PSeq)

Label: Advanved Chia-PET
Description: Advanced or long read ChIA-PET uses Tn5 transposases

Label: AGO-CLIP
Description: Map miRNA binding to AGO sites in C. elegans

Label: Barcode-Seq
Description: Characterize phenotypes of hundreds of different AAV strains

Label: BisChIP-Seq
Description: Bisulfite-treated chromatin immuno-precipitated DNA (BisChIP-seq), to correlate protein modifications with DNA methylation

Label: BLESS
Description: Breaks labeling, enrichment on streptavidin and sequencing (BLESS)

Label: Break-seq
Description: Double-stranded break labeling to map chromosome breaks (Break-seq)

Label: BruDRB-seq
Description: BruDRB-seq— to reveal gene-specific differences in elongation rates

Label: BruUV-Seq
Description: an approach that complements the Bru-seq technique by enhancing nascent RNA signal around promoters and enhancers genome-wide in intact cells

Label: CAB-Seq
Description: Chemical modification-assisted bisulfite sequencing (CAB-Seq) for 5caC detection

Label: CAGEscan
Description: CAGEscan: a mate-pair adaptation of nanoCAGE that captures the transcript 5′ ends linked to a downstream region

Label: CAP-seq
Description: CXXC affinity purification plus deep sequencing (CAP-seq)

Label: Capp-Seq
Description: Cancer personalized profiling by deep sequencing (CAPP-Seq)

Label: CapSeq
Description: 5’ anchored profiling of Pol II transcripts (CapSeq). Identifies pre-mRNAs, transspliced mRNAs, miRNAs, and noncoding RNAs

Label: CAST-ChIP
Description: Chromatin affinity purification from specific cell types by chromatin immunoprecipitation (CAST-ChIP)

Label: CATCH-IT
Description: Covalent attachment of tags to capture histones (CATCH‑IT)

Label: CATCH-seq
Description: Capture of Associated Targets on CHromatin (CATCH)

Label: CEL-Seq
Description: Cell expression by linear amplification and sequencing (CEL-Seq)

Label: CHART
Description: Capture hybridization analysis of RNA targets (CHART)

Label: Chem-Seq
Description: Chem-seq: to identify the sites bound by small chemical molecules

Label: Chia-PET
Description: ChIA-PET: chromatin interaction analysis by paired-end tag sequencing

Label: ChIP-BS-seq
Description: Bisulfite-treated chromatin immunoprecipitated DNA (ChIP-BS-seq), to correlate protein modifications with DNA methylation

Label: ChIPmentation
Description: Fast, robust, low-input ChIP-seq for histones and transcription factors

Label: CIP-TAP
Description: CIP-TAP for identifying capped small RNA (csRNA) species

Label: CirSeq
Description: Identify low abundance RNA viruses with circular sequencing (CirSeq)

Label: CLASH
Description: Crosslinking, ligation, and sequencing of hybrids (CLASH)

Label: ClickSeq
Description: Generate RNAseq libraries from stochastically terminated 3’-azido-blocked cDNA fragments (ClickSeq)

Label: CREST-seq
Description: Cis-regulatory element scan by tiling-deletion and sequencing (CREST-seq)

Label: CrY2H-seq
Description: Massively multiplexed assay for deep-coverage interactome mapping (CrY2H-seq)

Label: DArTSeq
Description: SNP genotyping-by-sequencing with double-enzymatic digestion of DArT markers (DArTSeq)

Label: ddRADseq
Description: Double digest restriction-site associated DNA marker generation (ddRADseq)

Label: Digenome-seq
Description: In vitro Cas9-digested whole-genome sequencing to profile genome-wide Cas9 off-target effects (Digenome-seq)

Label: Digital RNA
Description: Digital RNA: unique molecular barcodes are added after cDNA synthesis

Label: DIP-seq
Description: DNA immunoprecipitation followed by high throughput sequencing (DIP-seq))

Label: DLAF
Description: Directly ligate sequencing adaptors to the first-strand cDNA (DLAF)

Label: DMS-MapSeq
Description: Dimethyl Sulfate Mutational Profiling with Sequencing

Label: DMS-Seq
Description: DMS treatment coupled to a massively parallel sequencing (DMS-seq)

Label: Dnase I SIM
Description: Dnase I simplified in-nucleus method (Dnase I SIM) for plants

Label: DroNc-Seq
Description: Massively parallel sNuc-Seq with droplet technology

Label: Drop-Seq
Description: Analyze mRNA transcripts from individual cells in droplets (Drop-seq)

Label: Droplet-CirSeq
Description: Ultra-precise detection of mutations by droplet-based amplification of circularized DNA

Label: Duplex-Seq
Description: Duplex sequencing detects very rare mutations by sequencing and aligning both strands of the DNA

Label: END-seq
Description: DNA end resection and DSB discovery

Label: EnIGMA
Description: Enzyme-assisted Identification of Genome Modification Assay

Label: EPIG-Seq
Description: Extracting patterns and identifying genes methodology for RNA-Seq (EPIG-Seq)

Label: ezRAD
Description: Reduce costs of the original RAD-seq protocol (ezRAD-seq)

Label: FACS-seq
Description: Fluorescence-activated cell sorting and deep sequencing

Label: FAST-iCLIP
Description: Integrated pipeline with improved CLIP biochemistry and an automated informatic pipeline (FAST-iCLIP)

Label: FAST-SeqS
Description: Efficient method for the detection of aneuploidy by massively parallel sequencing

Label: fC-CET
Description: Whole-genome analysis of 5fC based on selective chemical labeling (fC-CET)

Label: fC-Seal
Description: A 5-formylcytosine-selective chemical labeling (fC-Seal) approach for genome-wide profiling of 5fC

Label: FlowSeq
Description: FACS followed by DNA extraction, SD-sequence amplification and sequencing (Flow-seq).

Label: FREQ-Seq
Description: Quantitative allele frequency detection with the use of barcodes (FREQ-Seq)

Label: FRISCR
Description: Fixed and recovered intact single-cell RNA (FRISCR)

Label: FRT-Seq
Description: Flowcell reverse transcription sequencing (FRT-seq) for strand-specific RNA-Seq

Label: Fusion-seq
Description: Identify fusion transcripts from paired-end RNA-sequencing

Label: G4 ChIP-seq
Description: Antibody-based G4 chromatin immunoprecipitation and high-throughput sequencing

Label: G4-seq
Description: Determine the location of potential G-quadruplexes in DNA (G4-seq)

Label: GRIL-seq
Description: Global small non-coding RNA target identification by ligation and sequencing (GRIL-seq)

Label: GRO-CAP
Description: Global run-on protocol called GRO-cap, which captures TSSs for both stable and unstable transcripts

Label: gSELEX-Seq
Description: Genomic systematic evolution of ligands by exponential enrichment (gSELEX-Seq)

Label: GTI-Seq
Description: Ribo-Seq: Ribosome profiling Global translation initiation sequencing (GTI-Seq)

Label: GUIDE-seq
Description: Genome-wide, unbiased identification of DSBs enabled by sequencing (GUIDE-seq), to profile off-target cleavage by CRISPR-Cas nucleases

Label: HELP-Seq
Description: HpaII tiny fragment enrichment by ligation-mediated PCR (HELP-Seq)

Label: hi-CLIP
Description: RNA hybrid and individual-nucleotide resolution ultraviolet crosslinking and immunoprecipitation (hiCLIP)

Label: Hi-SCL
Description: High-throughput Single-Cell Labeling in drop-based microfluidics followed by RNA-seq

Label: HiTS-Flip
Description: High-throughput sequencing: fluorescent ligand interaction profiling (HiTS-FLIP)

Label: hMeDIP-seq
Description: Hydroxymethylated DNA immunoprecipitation combined with next generation DNA sequencing (hMeDIP-seq)

Label: HT-SELEX
Description: High-throughput systematic evolution of ligands by exponential enrichment (HT-SELEX)

Label: HydEn-seq
Description: Hydrolytic end sequencing (HydEn-seq) to reveal replicase- and strand-specific patterns of ribonucleotides in the genome

Label: icSHAPE
Description: In vivo click selective 2’-hydroxyl acylation and profiling experiment (icSHAPE)

Label: Ig-Seq
Description: DNA sequencing of immunoglobulin genes (Ig-seq) for antibody repertoire determination

Label: IMS-MDA
Description: Immunomagnetic separation for targeted bacterial enrichment for MDA (IMS-MDA)

Label: in-cell SHAPE-Seq
Description: Combines in-cell probing of RNA structure with a measurement of gene expression to simultaneously characterize RNA structure and function in bacterial cells

Label: LIANTI
Description: Single-cell whole-genome analyses by Linear Amplification via Transposon Insertion

Label: Look-Seq
Description: determine the genomic consequences of DNA damage in ruptured micronuclei

Label: m1A mapping
Description: High-throughput sequencing for 1-methyladenosine (m1A) mapping in RNA

Label: MALBAC
Description: Multiple annealing and looping-based amplification cycles (MALBAC)

Label: MARDI
Description: Mutation Analysis With Random DNA Identifiers (MARDI)

Label: MARS-seq
Description: Massively parallel RNA single-cell sequencing framework

Label: MATQ-seq
Description: Multiple annealing and dC-tailing-based quantitative single-cell RNA-seq (MATQ-seq)

Label: MBDCap-Seq
Description: Methyl-CpG binding domain-based capture and sequencing (MDBCap-seq)

Label: MeRIP-Seq
Description: m6A-specific methylated RNA immunoprecipitation with nextgeneration sequencing (MeRIP-Seq)

Label: Methyl-seq
Description: Methyl-seq: uses methyl-sensitive enzymes to identify methylation patterns

Label: MethylCap-Seq
Description: Capture of methylated DNA using the MBD domain of MeCP2 (MethylCap-Seq)

Label: miCLIP-m5A
Description: A customized version of the individual-nucleotide-resolution crosslinking and immunoprecipitation (iCLIP) method (miCLIP)

Label: Micro-C XL
Description: Analysis of chromosome folding at mononucleosome resolution (Micro-C XL)

Label: MIDAS
Description: Massively parallel polymerase cloning and genome sequencing of single cells using nanoliter microwells.

Label: MINCE-seq
Description: Mapping In vivo Nascent Chromatin with EdU and sequencing (MINCE-seq)

Label: MIPSTR
Description: Targeted capture of STR loci by smMIPs (MIPSTR)

Label: MitoRCA-seq
Description: MitoRCA-seq to detect low-frequency mtDNA point mutations

Label: miTRAP
Description: miRNA trapping by RNA in vitro affinity purification (miTRAP)

Label: mNET-seq
Description: Native elongating transcript sequencing technology for mammalian chromatin (mNET-seq)

Label: Mosaic-Seq
Description: CRISPR barcoding system to jointly measure a cell's transcriptome and its sgRNA modulators

Label: Mseek
Description: A technique to purify and sequence mtDNA

Label: NanoCAGE
Description: nanoCAGE: a method that captures the 5′ ends of transcripts from as little as 10 ng of total RNA

Label: NOME-Seq
Description: Nucleosome Occupancy Methylome- Sequencing (NOMe-Seq), a single-molecule nucleosome positioning assay

Label: NS-seq
Description: Nascent strand sequencing (NS-seq) to discover DNA replication origins and G4 structures

Label: nuc-seq
Description: Single G2/M nucleus sequencing of cells in S phase (Nuc-seq)

Label: Nucleo-Seq
Description: Nucleo-Seq, to determine nucleosome organization across the genome

Label: ORGANIC
Description: Occupied regions of genomes from affinity-purified naturally isolated chromatin (ORGANIC)

Label: OS-Seq
Description: Oligonucleotide-selective sequencing (OS-Seq) captures and sequence gene targets on the flow cell

Label: oxBS-Seq
Description: Oxidative bisulfite sequencing (oxBS-Seq) to map 5-methylcytosine and 5-hydroxymethylcytosine

Label: PAIR
Description: Peptide nucleic acid-assisted identification of RBP (PAIR)

Label: PAPERCLIP
Description: High performance mRNA 3' end mapping method based on the CLIP technique

Label: PARIS
Description: Reversible psoralen crosslinking for global mapping of RNA duplexes in living cells

Label: PARTE
Description: Parallel analysis of RNA structures with temperature elevation (PARTE)

Label: Patch-seq
Description: Combine whole-cell electrophysiological patch-clamp recordings, single-cell RNA-sequencing, and morphological characterization (Patch-Seq)

Label: PB-seq
Description: Protein/DNA binding (PB–seq), to determine the binding energy landscape

Label: PD-Seq
Description: PD-Seq identifies candidate cellular targets for proteins

Label: PDZ-Seq
Description: Proteomic peptide-phage display (ProP-PD) to identify PDZ domains

Label: PE RAD-Seq
Description: Paired-end restriction-site associated DNA marker generation (PE RAD)

Label: PEAT
Description: Paired-end analysis of transcription start sites (PEAT)

Label: Perturb-Seq
Description: Scalable Single-Cell RNA Profiling of Pooled Genetic Screens

Label: PLATE-Seq
Description: Geome-wide mRNA profiling methodology to complement high-throughput screening assays

Label: Pol II CLIP
Description: Crosslinking and immunoprecipitation of Pol II (Pol II CLIP)

Label: Poly(A)-ClickSeq
Description: Sensitive and specific enrichment for poly(A) site junctions without the need for complex samples preparation, fragmentation or purification.

Label: PRO-cap
Description: Precision nuclear run-on and sequencing to detect Pol II initiation sites (PRO-cap)

Label: PRO-seq
Description: Precision nuclear run-on and sequencing to detect Pol II pause sites (PRO-seq)

Label: Profiler
Description: Identification of antigenic regions preferentially targeted by polyclonal antibody responses

Label: ProP-PD
Description: Proteomic peptide-phage display (ProP-PD) to identify domain–short linear motif (SLiM) interactions

Label: Pseudo-seq
Description: Pseudo-seq: a method for genome-wide pseudouridine identification

Label: RedBS-Seq
Description: Reduced bisulfite sequencing (redBS-Seq), to map 5-formylcytosine (5fC) in DNA

Label: Rep-Seq
Description: DNA sequencing of immunoglobulin genes for antibody repertoire determination (Rep-Seq)

Label: RepeatSeq
Description: A tool for genotyping microsatellite repeats (RepeatSeq)

Label: Repli-Seq
Description: Repli Seq—to map temporally ordered replicating DNA

Label: RICC-seq
Description: Radiation-induced spatially correlated cleavage of DNA with sequencing (RICC-seq)

Label: RIL-seq
Description: RNA interaction by ligation and sequencing (RIL-seq)

Label: RNAtag-Seq
Description: Generate multiple RNA-seq libraries in a single reaction (RNAtag-Seq)

Label: RNET-seq
Description: Elongating transcript sequencing (NET-seq) with RNase footprinting of the transcripts (RNET-seq)

Label: Safe-SeqS
Description: Safe-sequencing system is a unique molecular identifier approach to detect rare variants (Safe-SeqS)

Label: SC3-seq
Description: Single-cell mRNA3-prime end sequencing followed by 3-prime-end enrichment

Label: scATAC-seq (Microfluidics)
Description: Mapping single cell genomes for transposase-accessible chromatin

Label: scDNase-seq
Description: DNase-seq to detect genome-wide DNase I hypersensitive sites in single cells

Label: scWGBS
Description: Single cell WGBS optimized for profiling many samples at low coverage

Label: SELEX
Description: Systematic evolution of ligands by exponential enrichment (SELEX-seq)

Label: SELEX-seq
Description: Systematic evolution of ligands by exponential enrichment (SELEX)

Label: Seq-Well
Description: Barcoded mRNA capture beads and single cells are sealed in an array of subnanoliter wells

Label: SHAPE-MaP
Description: Selective 2’-hydroxyl acylation analyzed by primer extension and mutational profiling (SHAPE-MaP)

Label: SHAPE-Seq
Description: Selective 2’-hydroxyl acylation analyzed by primer extension sequencing (SHAPE-Seq)

Label: Simul-seq
Description: Combined DNA and RNA sequencing for whole-genome and transcriptome profiling

Label: Single cell ATAC-seq (cell index)
Description: Combinatorial cellular indexing and ATAC-Seq to measure chromatin accessibility in large numbers of sinlge cells

Label: SLBS
Description: Single-cell locus-specific bisulfite sequencing (SLBS) measuring DNA methylation

Label: SMA
Description: Semirandom primed PCR-based mRNA transcriptome ampliﬁcation (SMA)

Label: Smart-Seq
Description: Switch mechanism at the 5’ end of RNA templates (Smart)

Label: Smart-seq2
Description: Switch mechanism at the 5’ end of RNA templates (Smart)

Label: SMiLE-seq
Description: Selective microfluidics-based ligand enrichment followed by sequencing (SMiLE-seq)

Label: smMIP
Description: Single molecule molecular inversion probes (smMIPs) for detecting low frequency targets

Label: SMORE-Seq
Description: Simultaneous mapping of RNA ends by sequencing (SMORE-seq)

Label: Sono-Seq
Description: Sonication of cross-linked chromatin, (Sono-Seq) to map locations of high chromatin accessibility

Label: SPARE
Description: Speciﬁc parallel ampliﬁcation of 5’ RNA Ends (SPARE) to identify microRNA processing intermediates

Label: STRT-seq-2i

Label: Structure-Seq
Description: Use dimethyl sulphate methylation of unprotected adenines and cytosines (Structure-Seq)

Label: TARDIS
Description: TARDIS, a targeted RNA directional sequencing method for rare RNA discovery.

Label: TCR Chain Paring

Label: TL-seq

Label: TRIBE
Description: Targets of RNA-binding proteins identified by editing (TRIBE)

Label: TruePrime

Label: Tuba-seq
